mapper.select: SELECT ch.ch_no , ch.ch_ttl FROM channel_member chm, channel ch where chm.ch_no = ch.ch_no and ch.ch_delyn = 'N' and chm.mem_no = #{memNo}

SELECT ch.ch_no , chm.ch_mem_th_no , cht.th_ttl FROM channel_member chm, channel ch, channel_thread cht where chm.ch_no = ch.ch_no and ch.ch_delyn = 'N' and cht.ch_no = chm.ch_no and ch.ch_no = cht.ch_no and cht.th_no = chm.ch_mem_th_no and chm.mem_no = #{memNo}

SELECT Round((214748364800 - sum(atd.atch_file_size)) / 1024) ch_size FROM cloud c, atch_file_detail atd where mem_no = #{memNo} and ch_no = 0 and th_no = 0 and c.cld_file_no = atd.atch_detail_file_id

SELECT Round(p.plan_tot_sz / 1024) ch_size , cp.plan_ccl FROM channel_plan cp, plan p where cp.ch_no = #{chNo} and cp.plan_no = p.plan_no and paid_no = (SELECT MAX(paid_no) FROM channel_plan where ch_no = #{chNo} )

SELECT Round(p.plan_tot_sz / 1024) ch_size , cp.plan_ccl FROM channel_plan cp, plan p, channel_thread cht where cp.ch_no = cht.ch_no and cht.th_no = #{thNo} and cp.plan_no = p.plan_no and paid_no = (SELECT MAX(paid_no) FROM channel_plan where ch_no = cht.ch_no )

SELECT Round(#{chSize} - (nvl(sum(atd.atch_file_size),0) / 1024)) ch_size FROM cloud c, atch_file_detail atd where 1=1
AND ch_no = #{chNo} and th_no = 0
AND th_no = ${thNo} and ch_no = 0
and c.cld_file_no = atd.atch_detail_file_id

SELECT p.plan_tot_sz ch_size , cp.plan_ccl FROM channel_plan cp, plan p where cp.ch_no = #{chNo} and cp.plan_no = p.plan_no and paid_no = (SELECT MAX(paid_no) FROM channel_plan where ch_no = #{chNo} )

SELECT p.plan_tot_sz ch_size , cp.plan_ccl FROM channel_plan cp, plan p, channel_thread cht where cp.ch_no = cht.ch_no and cht.th_no = #{thNo} and cp.plan_no = p.plan_no and paid_no = (SELECT MAX(paid_no) FROM channel_plan where ch_no = cht.ch_no )
